metadata.dc:author: Davar Rodríguez, C
metadata.dc:description: Author studies incidence of Pediculus capitis infestation in children of public schools in Alcalá de Henares, which was of 2.7 +/- 0.1% during years 1980-1984. Epidemiologic aspects are commented.
metadata.dc:title: Incidencia de infestación por Pedículus cápitis en la población escolar de Alcalá de Henares.
[Incidence of Pediculus capitis infestation in the student population of Alcala de Henares].
